# VEHICLE::SET_ENABLE_VEHICLE_SLIPSTREAMING

## Summary
Turns slipstreaming (speeding up when trailing another vehicle) on or off for ALL vehicles

## Parameters
* **BOOL** enableSlipstreaming: Enable or disable slipstreaming for all vehicles

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Enable/Disables global slipstream physics
